reviews.sentence: review of garden wing. just spent 4 days at the hotels garden wing. Excellent hotel friendly staff and good location. Make sure you pick the Garden Wing as the Tower Wing looks dated and needs a refurb. Breakfast is excellent with probably the best selection I have seen for a while I ve stayed at some good 5 star hotels but this is the best selection so farEating in the hotel is pricey but what do you expect if you are living it up 5 star.

thoroughly spoilt received an upgrade to the Valley wing. Exceptional service great inclusions at no cost calming environment and made to feel quite special. Absolutely fantastic and one of the best hotel experiences we have ever had. had not stayed there for quite some time and whether it was just the Valley Wing offering not sure but even the level of service at the pool and the Waterfall Cafe was exceptional.

5 Stars but kind of old. nearby orchard. good location. nothing to complaint about just that the rooms are a bit old. i booked through hotel quickly and got a very best rate. you can use my code JYAKL to redeem some credit for your next hotel stay.

Shangri la 3 day visit. Quality stay and brilliant staff. Well recommended. At the price one of the best hotels we have visited in the world. Perfect for a 3 day stay but such a short visit did not leave us with adequate time to enjoy all the facilities which was a pity as they were good.

Not what I expected from a Shangri la. We had Christmas lunch at the hotel yesterday and I was very disappointed. When I worked for the group in the late 80s early 90s the Shangri la Singapore was ranked as the 3rd best hotel in the world. While it still looks good the service level in the restaurant is not what it used to be. The special menu for Blu was advertised as having 4 entrees but in fact it was one. They fixed a fish they called rainbow trout as an alternative but it looked and tasted like salmon. even though I know they are similar this was way to close to call. Additionally it seems every item had alcohol in it with no substitutes. On top of that the staff tried to convince me it was okay to drink or eat it anyway not very smart and surprising for a place with so many muslims. Then to add insult to injury they charge SGD 240 for two iced lemon teas outrageousOn the good side the turkey entree was very good and the portions were generous. The Christmas decore in the hotel was also very well done.

Exceptional. Absolutely made our stay perfect. Absolutely must get the horizon club member. Makes the whole stay worth the extra cost. Cocktail hour was a wonderful adventure each night and we could not wait. Breakfast was so much more than we expected and definitely goes above and beyond every other place we have ever stayed. We will definitely be back and HIGHLY recommend. We had several other couples stay in Singapore while we were there but they stayed at various other places. Shangri La was BY FAR the best and absolutely wonderful. Everything from the turn down service to the concierge remembering our names. Can not say enough good things.

Great staff excellent gym and the best breakfast. I always stay. Shangri La in Singapore and it never disappoints me. Breakfast is excellent. If you are a fitness freak then the gym is exceptional. Location is great and the waterfall restaurant is pretty good and reasonably priced.

Very comfortable and tasteful but not to the extent expected for the cost. Bed was great. Little bakery in the lobby was very good. Poor value for money. Lobby bar and food offerings throughout were ridiculously expensive. Room was lovely but very expensive as well.

Drilling. beware they will ask u to pay more for the inconvenience. They checked me in with my baby in my pram next to me. sory for the drilling that is going on daily 9am6pm but if you pay extra we will put you in another wing where it is nice and quiet for your baby. Seriously asking me to pay more so my hotel room is quiet. Drilling and general banging went to 7 pm most days vibrating the floor and as a result the baby travel cot. Terrible stay after hoping for a relaxing break.

excellent service friendly very helpful staff. Given a very comfortable spacious room very good bathroom very clean. Beautiful pool for swimming withprovision of lounges with towels iced water available. We would choose Shangri la again as a retired person the accommodation cost is significant.

PositivesApreciate front desk acceded request to change room city view to pool view. Also like that staff was always quick to bring amenities such as baby soap up to room when needed. Negatives1. I think you are understaffed for breakfasts. High chairs are not cleaned and either service is quite slow staff is still not well trained enough for example when seated no one takes order for coffee tea 2. Have more play options for children. I think u can do with a free outdoor playground and not bundle it with buds. Given your location nestled in the woods and being somewhat near but not too close to Orchard and having such a wonderful range of dining options and excellent hardware of rooms lobby your hotel makes a great choice for many families wishing to stay here. But I think without Buds there is practically nothing a kid can do besides the short baking classes. Even your swimming pool is not exactly kids friendly unlike your sister property Rasa Sentosa. Hence I think it is in your favour if you would increase the range of options for kids activities. 3. Lastly I think you should further integrate the payment options for Golden Circle members. I was not aware that GC members can not pay for the FnB spends at check out with the GC points which was a very big surprise to me. It was not pleasant for me to have forked out extra cash when I already have a sizable pool of points I wanted to use notwithstanding that there is an expiry date to the use of GC points and was mentally prepared to pay with it. Most of your hotel guests dining using your hotel facilities will quite naturally charge to the room. And a sizable portion of your guests will also likely be GC members. I think it makes sense for you to integrate such payment options at check out. Or at least have the restaurant staff cashier to offer the use of GC points at payment and pre warn guests who choose to pay by charging to rooms that they will unable to use points at check out. I did not like I was only made aware of this fact at check out. Rather disappointing.

Do not eat at the Japanese restaurant on the 24th floor. About 3x expensive vs many places in Singapore. Go to Tomi Shushi instead. Also service sucks. Split our sake two times. Did n’t even offer a make up or to take it off the bill.

Staying at your hotel was a great experience. However before arriving I used the ap to pay for my room rate and deposit in full in advanced and checked in online. On arrival reception staff had no information regarding this and requested I pay another deposit I refused and showed them my application status and bank account transaction. This caused a delay after more than 12hrs of travel. I experienced the same issue on check out having already payed for my room rate in full prior to arrival on check out I was requested to pay for the room if I had not once again refused I would have been charged twice for my stay I carried out same process of authenticating my claim providing evidence of my transaction this again caused a delay and I was not satisfied with this service. Please make updates to your system so that the reality of the situation is reflected in your check in computers and so your staff are aware of your guests that have already paid for their room in advance. The soul purpose of checking in and out online was to expedite this process however it caused a greater delay due to a lack of knowledge by your staff.

Love it My only complaint is that my room was already prepaid 100. However when we checked out I was charged 24948 2495 x 3 nights 8092 again. I do not understand why if my room is prepaid 100 and your staff still charged me for the room again. I feel ripped off. Please reverse the check out charges. I should not have to pay for my room twice. Thanks.

1. Not enough value for the price. Plus we had to pay 1night extra just to guarantee an early check in 7 am because accordingly they are fully booked only to find out it is very quick for them to provide choices of available rooms when being asked for preferences. 2. The front desk misled us by insisting the corporate rate 295 night does NOT include breakfast that we have to pay extra 60 person at least to get a breakfast when we checked in. Too late to found out that it should have been included when we were checking out through the guest officer. In fairness they agreed to deduct the breakfast rate but I did not gain any from that because it is a business trip stay. I could have trade the money for convenience but the major disappointment was misleading information. 3. Hotel is not accessible to conveniently grab something to eat or buy essentials. Not really for someone with limited time. I will not recommend this hotel for corporate business trips nor personal getaways. There are plenty to choose from.
This would have to rate as the best Horizon Club that I have visited. The staff are all excellent and the choice of food and drink exceeds all others. Great job by Chef ‍ Ganesan Ashok. THANK YOU.

When I entered the room there was strong scent in the room. It seemed from cleaning detergent. But it was too strong so I felt a little headache. That is the reason I rate the room condition 4 out of 5. Except this everything was good.

Not a 5 stars hotel. We could n’t be more disappointed about stay here we have almost something to complaint about everyday. the evening of our arrival at 3 am everyone was busy with the Xmas decorations and they took 15 mins to help us with 6 bags to get in. they gave us twin beds instead of king size the power on the room did n’t worked and we could n’t charge our phones went we tried to call the reception and phones in the room did n’t worked neither the rooms need some renovations. no one picked up the phone when we tried to get food in the room the next everything. and right now we are at the reception and we ca n’t get in because they forgot to extend our rooms it ’s midnight and we are obligated to pay 3 times higher the rate of our room and move to a twin beds again. definitely Not the standards of a 5 stars hotel.

Bearing in mind that we are currently living in extraordinary times Shangri la is still doing a great job managing visitor expectations. Room amenities were excellent staff were very friendly and welcoming and polite and the premises were well kept. My children loved the tent in the room and playing at BUDS. And the early check in and late check out were very much appreciated. We were slightly disappointed that the outdoor play area was shut for repairs. We were not informed about it at check in and only found out when we were exploring the hotel in search of outdoor play for the children. It is completely understandable that the hotel is sprucing up its premises during this lull period but I ’d like to point out that perhaps keeping the outdoor areas open and the indoor ones shut may be a better idea in this current situation. I had reservations on allowing the children to pay in BUDS but put my faith blindly in Shangri La ’s reputation that the area would be well disinfected and took our own precautions as well. Another thing I ’d like to point out is that we were surprised that the Line did not have proper crockery for our children. They were offered plates and a small bowl but only a teaspoon accompanied those instead of the usual set of plastic fork and spoon we are used to receiving. Surprised since there is a floor just for children and an indoor playground which does mean that there is a market for families with young children. Small touches like these are usually much appreciated by parents like us. Overall we had a great stay. Thank you.
